organization.title: Organization
organization.subtitle: Manage your pharmacy chain or group

header.resetProfileMessage: Are you sure you want to reset your profile? This will remove all your data and set your account back to the initial onboarding state. This action cannot be undone.

completeProfile.completeProfileDescription: Welcome to InteriMed! To access all features of the platform, please complete your profile first.

onboarding.verify_intro: Please provide your details below. We use secure AI verification to certify your account.

step1.title: Legal Considerations
step1.facilityLegalText1: As a healthcare facility using InteriMed, you must ensure compliance with Swiss labor laws when engaging temporary staff.
step1.facilityLegalText2: You are responsible for verifying that temporary workers comply with maximum working hours, rest periods, and other legal requirements.
step1.facilityLegalText3: Please ensure all temporary staff have the necessary qualifications and work permits.
step1.professionalLegalText1: For employees working 100% (typically 40-42 hours/week), it is nearly impossible to legally take additional shifts at another pharmacy.
step1.professionalLegalText2: Swiss labor law sets a strict maximum of 50 hours per week (45 hours in some retail contexts). A 100% employee typically works 42 hours, leaving only 8 hours maximum.
step1.professionalLegalText3: According to the Code of Obligations (Art. 321a), you must obtain written approval from your main employer to work for a competitor.
step1.professionalLegalText4: The law requires 11 consecutive hours of rest between shifts (can be reduced to 8 hours once per week).
step1.areYouEmployed: Are you currently employed by a facility?
step1.areYouEmployedDescription: Activate if you work for an organization
step1.termsAcceptanceDescription: I understand and acknowledge the legal considerations and terms of service
step1.termsAcceptanceText: I understand and acknowledge the legal considerations and
step1.note: By proceeding, you acknowledge that you have read and understood the legal considerations applicable to your role.

restrictedServices.title: Create Profile for Internal Facility Services Only
restrictedServices.description: This account can only be used to access facility internal services. Account verification must be completed for accessing full services.

modal.title: Restricted Services - Internal Facility Access Only
modal.intro: By creating your profile with internal facility access only, you will __NOT__ have access to the following services:
modal.interimServices: Interim Services - You cannot take on replacement shifts or temporary assignments
modal.jobPostulations: Job Postulations - You cannot apply for job openings or positions
modal.marketplaceAccess: Marketplace Access - You cannot access the marketplace to find opportunities
modal.willHaveAccess: What you WILL have access to:
modal.facilityInternal: Facility internal services (calendar, team management, internal communications)
modal.note: Note: To gain full access to all services, you must complete account verification through the full onboarding process.

step2.title: Select Your Role
step2.description: Choose the option that best describes your situation
step2.professionalDescription: I am a healthcare professional looking for work opportunities
step2.facilityDescription: I represent a company or facility looking for professionals
step2.organizationDescription: I represent a pharmacy chain or organization

chain.title: Contact Information
chain.description: Please provide your contact details so we can assist you with setting up your organization account
chain.messagePlaceholder: Please describe your organization and your needs...

step4.title: GLN Verification
step4.description: Do you have a GLN (Global Location Number)?
step4.company_description: Please verify your identity as the responsible person for this facility.

professional_gln.title: GLN information
professional_gln.text1: Professional number required for certified medical professionals in Switzerland (pharmacists, dentists, doctors, etc.).
professional_gln.text2: For other professions (nurses, assistants, etc.), this number is not mandatory.
professional_gln.text3: Enable if you have your own GLN number.
professional_gln.text_new: Professional number required for certified medical professionals in Switzerland (pharmacists, dentists, doctors, etc.). Enable if you have your own GLN number.

company_gln.title: GLN information
company_gln.text1: The GLN (Global Location Number) is a unique identifier for your facility or company.
company_gln.text2: Providing your GLN helps us verify your business details automatically and speeds up the verification process.
company_gln.text3: This field is optional, but recommended for faster account verification.

facility_id.label: 1. Responsible Person Identity Document
facility_id.desc: Upload ID card of a responsible person listed in the registry.

facility_bill.label: 2. Billing / Tax Document
facility_bill.desc: Upload a recent bill or tax document for facility verification.

errors.wait_message: Please wait {{seconds}} seconds before trying again
errors.review_inputs: Please review your inputs. If you believe this is an error, contact our urgent support below.
errors.describe_issue: Describe the issue you are facing...

success.professional_redirect: Your professional profile is now active. Redirecting to complete your profile setup...
success.facility_redirect: Your facility profile is now active. Redirecting to complete your profile setup...

phone.title: Mobile Verification
phone.subtitle: Enter your phone number to receive a secure identity code.
phone.sent_text: We sent a verification code to {{prefix}} {{number}}.
phone.verified_text: Your phone number {{prefix}} {{number}} has been successfully verified.

step5.title: Facility Information
step5.description: Please provide the official GLN (Global Location Number) for your facility to verify your organization.
